title: Follow the Convoy
content:
At this point, we recommend that you defend the guide and the convoy to protect your cover as a True Soul. Choosing the option of "Defend the caravan, attack the Harpers" grants approval up towards Astarion and approval down towards Gale and Karlach. Simply defeat the Harpers and after the battle, continue following Kar'niss until you reach the destination which completes this quest.

Follow the Convoy Objectives

Retrieve the instrument from the drow Minthara.
